item.description:
Come join us for the Quebec City Summer Music Festival. This event will have something to please everyone, regardless of age or tastes in music. The Quebec City Summer Music Festival lineup will have festival goers wishing they could be everywhere at once. The festival will feature more than 400 artists from over 22 countries and 8 Canadian provinces with programming noted for its flavor, daring, and originality. The shows will take place in a number of different venues, thus enhancing the Festival's power of attraction.

View the Quebec Music Festival Web Site

Our accommodations at the Marriot Courtyard Downtown Hotel is within a very short walk to all the Music Festival events.

    Trip Includes:
  • 3 nights at the Marriott Courtyard Hotel
  • 2 Buffet Breakfasts
  • Optional Motor Coach Transportation
*Motor Coach transportation will incur an additional cost of approx $80 per person with a minimum of 30 persons due to fuel costs at the time of trip this estimated cost may increase.

For more information or to sign-up for this Trip online goto the link below. Once you've registered and paid your deposit your RSVP will be added to this event.
Quebec Music Festival Trip July 17-20, 2009

Payments by personal check should be made payable to Alfresco Adventures and mailed to the address below. Please include address & phone number and email address on or with your check.

Alfresco Adventures
P.O. Box 921
Hampton, NH 03843
item.name: Quebec Summer Music Festival Long Weekend Trip July 17-20, 2009
